justification: Proposal ignores B’s conservative, injury-averse, volume-first profile: it asks B to give up a Tier 2 possession WR (Holt) and a healthy Tier 1 RB for an injured, volatile RB (Foster) and a boom-bust WR (Kyle). Rationale centers on A’s benefits and omits B’s priorities (health, workload stability, strength of schedule). While trade mechanics are feasible, it’s contextually misaligned and B’s acceptance is likely much lower than 0.35.
